subject: The Friday Unwind: Your week in one smooth scroll
description_text:
Catch up on what’s happened this week — no stress, just the highlights.

View in browser (https://d56STN04.na1.hubspotlinks.com/Ctc/UD+113/d56STN04/VWnWDv6Nbf24VWtgXJ6m-kL_W2NZxg55Fj6bNM5Y3kx5n4LbW7Y9pgv6lZ3mHW7kr1-q1zKY2HV1pZXk8YZ8JCW17Qc2p5RdQDRW90r4-K549XfFW6dng4C6jb7FSW1zgMgY9hJBR_VtyNfr390qFTVKt5QK336JsSW7fk3YG86vQ0NW49gLrX5xGmNVVvjTrt3xKsf7W74Jk062qMwTYW18R7M85_vXfJW2nvtFq2CXjrmW98F0C22PQC3JW40N7Nf1pvJDRW4sYMmz7dNSt6W1r7W852s4vbdV6PJ92799NYgW5-KG2137MLL1W1kW1Z56zqBnTW14lvGW3DGkJ_W4tYRgH76lyc2W4y6j1B2TM_bGW3fVfST7twcTXW6SjQt73BnqjXW232xmk8Cf6DzW4D02Sy5MBxpDW8jdTv062bdVTW873dRm6qycXPW4JDBhz7WGwDkW5d_TPX8GnsKPN5CjfDv43X12W8ZBGwd3-QSWMN8zSrQrWn3ZbW8BQVHJ4vFjBqW20_qMq5rVCJ2W5vmwXs49Vk3yW8STQvB91-9sRW6VpVkX915NWrW7J56Fp8McPK7W6Pjw5C4M6tMFf23D-dC04 )

Hey Atto,

Happy Halloween! ? Somehow it’s already Friday. Between the disappearing days, overflowing tabs, and a few inbox moments that felt a little haunted, this week’s been a blur.

If your focus ghosted midweek, we’ve got you covered. Here are this week’s ecommerce highlights: quick reads, smart insights, and a new webinar worth a watch.

Catch you next Friday,

– The Athos Commerce Team

Featured This Week

? Podcast | Kate Massey: Why AI Won’t Replace Human-led Brand Experience (https://d56STN04.na1.hubspotlinks.com/Ctc/UD+113/d56STN04/VWnWDv6Nbf24VWtgXJ6m-kL_W2NZxg55Fj6bNM5Y3kx3pyd0W7Y8-PT6lZ3nyW5lQ54z8-NLcdW7nRcJd1hwbDQW2qD0pK2GVXdmW1MgPKM82WZQKW6BXKhS3nGYw1W7hm6WM6gb1nZVHGNjK4nygfYW424flK5SychXW7kKGBD7nvj2BW7m4rW55YxS7hN8rGrhZzqZ8WW75KcKH67r9TYW7SFtl_36pSVWN1NbN_hwqFDjN21ZZQ_Xqgh3W53yCbY8J2LkwW6_Tqnw25pJNHW7nWzQ196RCB0W5H7Jqz7_NZykW8zf1Cl6Hnf6LW4BG9b48nm7YFW2y7_Db2nGG1hW61n52V28M87WW3y3yl04zgzNtW4LmVdw26j9M6W2pyC9v4Cl07zf8XldB604 )

Kate joins the Beyond The Fold podcast and reveals why brand experience will always outlast automation in achieving long-term success.



November 12 Webinar | From Discovery to Conversion: Play-by-Play Insights from Kick Game & Ecommerce Experts (https://d56STN04.na1.hubspotlinks.com/Ctc/UD+113/d56STN04/VWnWDv6Nbf24VWtgXJ6m-kL_W2NZxg55Fj6bNM5Y3j25n4LbW50kH_H6lZ3p_W5QF_kg4ltXFsW17txGn5FwqDcW7THD_X51BGpgVPR4Ly1GjmXFW6DG-Vq9b356WW28tcQq4K_zkBW58cqST2rsZ4lVMz5jF1LTGsLW6wsSCb5-NSB1N29xKpTSYMC3TC_sJ17KWcfW8_xDCr6d5D2SVhygNs36tDFtW6Bp0kp30PLkwW1-r_my6hK_9nW2FBMrV3RBF5kW3d4Sm583b6z-W84SVhD3wL60fN7Npk9fRj2qfW66pyML7LFSFzW1nK5w16N9-kdW4D548X6KBqW0W7FdgmY72CZ_jW83RlbB4SsXSlW2B_LG49213HgN11dQj8G-zllW9jjhg86DW_5qW6FLVBM87MBYdW2BMpCM70fQxqW8r75Kl3svDSmW1p8-mD4NlVjPW3-XSk65x1tgXf7tTQqj04 )

BFCM is around the corner — is your site ready? Join Kick Game — the go-to destination for trainers and streetwear — and a panel of ecommerce experts from Athos Commerce, Octane AI, and Blend Commerce as they share the insider moves you need to boost conversions this peak season.

On-demand Webinar | Google X Athos Commerce (https://d56STN04.na1.hubspotlinks.com/Ctc/UD+113/d56STN04/VWnWDv6Nbf24VWtgXJ6m-kL_W2NZxg55Fj6bNM5Y3kR3pyd0W8wLKSR6lZ3nRW7TBs2J9f8f1JW1FlxHs5tyFDVW2LtCn897C10vW1Wwy9W6tdkX9W1c39gM7QhL9VW6LVqm449dnB-W4BZX-93GxNjnW3g55Bv51G7q0N6ZgzZlN_rV-W7pMh0T16j3YvW3rM_K24Q09jqW4CW5fh1Y5v7bW1fC3Tm38Zzv0N1PpwVJFCmc0W7R-g1s28-xpxW29_dgg7NJ6bcW4mcZ6Y3nWV3yW754HQr50rPzNW7_k2TY9j3RLbW8Zy6_D7px3hjN2vfGh1NHzFQW1yTFWp6Lq6RcW4nYMR07tKRDTW1JCpqs8hsHyqW3Tdt9S891gFpW85Qk3z5_Y14xW3Yq4Mq5GmW8TVjgJJX2SnPwFf55X0hg04 )
